channel.title: Embedding Faust DSPs on the Axoloti
channel.description:
Hello :) I saw in an old post that there was a will to support Faust inside the Axoloti ecosystem. https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/converting-a-fuzz-model-from-spice/2164/4
Has there been some progress on that? Is there a convenient toolkit to build arbitrary faust DSPs into Axoloti objects, which would get their UI from the Faust code?
